TEXT.TITLE: SCOTT'S LIQUID GOLD INC YEAR OPER NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr two cts vs 10 cts Oper net 162,300 vs 773,400 Revs 16.6 mln vs 16.5 mln Avg shrs 8,282,480 vs 8,045,493 NOTE: Excludes gains of 138,000 dlrs or two cts/shr vs 733,000 dlrs or nine cts from benefit of tax loss carryforwards. Reuter
